Volt Europa X Climate Modelling

A website to replicate the work of Volt Europa on climate modelling

This small website aims to replicate and extend the works from Volt Europa on assessing how fast one should decrease our emissions.

The github repo hosting the information can be found here

IPCC Data

The IPCC Report has the following conclusions:

Percent Chance to reach Goal Total Carbon Budget Degree Target
0 17% 900 1.5
1 17% 1450 1.7
2 17% 2300 1.8
3 33% 650 1.5
4 33% 1050 1.7
5 33% 1700 1.8
6 50% 500 1.5
7 50% 850 1.7
8 50% 1350 1.8
9 67% 400 1.5
10 67% 700 1.7
11 67% 1150 1.8
12 83% 300 1.5
13 83% 550 1.7
14 83% 900 1.8

Or in a more compact form:

Degrees 17% 33% 50% 67% 83%
1.5 900 650 500 400 300
1.7 1450 1050 850 700 550
1.8 2300 1700 1350 1150 900
